SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(BAD_HST_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BAD_HST_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'HST' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_BAD_HST_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(BAD_HST_ID) AS BAD_HST_ID FROM BAD1200 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MENU_ID = #menuId# AND BAD_HST_ID LIKE 'HST' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' ) WHERE 1 = 1
INSERT INTO BAD1200 ( LIC_GRP_ID , PRJ_GRP_ID , PRJ_ID , MENU_ID , BAD_ID , BAD_HST_ID , BAD_HST_TYPE_CD , BAD_HST_USR_ID , BAD_HST_USR_NM , BAD_HST_USR_DEPT_NM , BAD_HST_USR_POSITION_NM , BAD_HST_USR_DUTY_NM , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId# , #prjGrpId# , #prjId# , #menuId# , #badId# , #newBadHstId# , #badHstTypeCd# , #usrId# , #usrNm# , #usrDeptNm# , #usrPositionNm# , #usrDutyNm# , #regDtm# , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #modifyUsrId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
